items.title: Zelensky names spy chief to head presidential office after corruption row
items.title_zh: Zelensky在腐败排行后给总统办公室的 间谍负责人起名
items.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has named spy chief Kyrylo Budanov as his new chief of staff, just over a month after his previous top aide resigned amid a corruption row.
items.summary_zh: 乌克兰总统沃洛德米尔·泽连斯基(Volodymyr Zelensky)任命间谍队长克列洛·布达诺夫为新任参谋长,就在他前一名高级助手因腐败而辞职一个月后。

items.title: What images and videos tell us about why Swiss bar fire spread so quickly
items.title_zh: 图片和视频告诉我们为什么瑞士酒吧大火如此迅速蔓延
items.summary: Investigators are racing to establish how and why the deadly New Year's Eve fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort spread so rapidly.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士滑雪胜地的一家酒吧遭到致命的除夕会起火,

items.title: Swiss bar fire likely started by sparklers on champagne bottles
items.title_zh: 瑞士酒吧起火 可能是香槟瓶上起火
items.summary: A fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort appears to have been caused by sparklers placed on bottles of champagne that came "too close to the ceiling", authorities said.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士滑雪胜地的一家酒吧起火, 似乎是被放入"离天花板太近"的香槟瓶上放出火花而起,

items.title: 'Living a nightmare': Families of teens missing after ski resort fire desperate for news
items.title_zh: "生活在噩梦": 在滑雪胜地火灾后失踪的十几岁家庭迫不及待的消息
items.summary: The families of teenagers missing after a fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort are facing an agonising wait for news and appealing for information about their loved ones online.
items.summary_zh: 在瑞士滑雪胜地的一家酒吧起火后失踪的青少年家庭,

items.title: Watch: Earthquake interrupts Mexico's president during press conference
items.title_zh: 看:地震在新闻发布会上打断了墨西哥总统
items.summary: President Claudia Sheinbaum calmly stopped her press conference when the 6.5 magnitude trembler shook the room and set off the country's earthquake alert system.
items.summary_zh: 总统克劳迪娅·谢因鲍姆(Claudia Sheinbaum)平静地停止了她的记者招待会,当时6.5级震颤器震动了房间并启动了该国的地震警报系统.

items.title: Trump warns US will intervene if Iran kills protesters
items.title_zh: 特朗普警告如果伊朗杀害抗议者,美国会介入
items.summary: US President Donald Trump has warned Iran's authorities against killing peaceful protesters, saying Washington "will come to their rescue".
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普已警告伊朗当局不要杀害和平抗议者,称华盛顿"将前来救援".

items.title: Woman killed in suspected mountain lion attack in US
items.title_zh: 在美国疑似山狮袭击中被害的女人
items.summary: A hiker is believed to have been killed by at least one mountain lion in the US state of Colorado on Wednesday, according to wildlife officials.
items.summary_zh: 据野生动物官员说,一名徒步者据信星期三在美国科罗拉多州被至少一头山狮所杀.

items.title: Anthony Joshua's driver charged over Nigeria crash that killed two
items.title_zh: Anthony Joshua的司机在尼日利亚坠机 造成两人丧生时 受到指控
items.summary: Anthony Joshua's driver has been charged after a crash in Nigeria injured the boxer and killed two of his team members, police have said.
items.summary_zh: Anthony Joshua的司机在尼日利亚坠机后被控告,

items.title: Young Italian golfer feared dead: What we know about Swiss resort fire
items.title_zh: 意大利青年高尔夫球员担心会死:瑞士度假胜地起火的我们所知
items.summary: A fire at a bar in a Swiss ski resort has killed 40 people and injured another 119, officials say.
items.summary_zh: 瑞士滑雪胜地一酒吧起火 造成40人死亡再出119人受伤 官员称.

items.title: China's BYD overtakes Tesla as world's top EV seller
items.title_zh: 中国BYD超越特斯拉成为全球EV最卖家.
items.summary: China's BYD has overtaken Elon Musk's Tesla as the world's biggest seller of electric vehicles (EVs), marking the first time it has outpaced its American rival in annual sales.
items.summary_zh: 中国BYD已经超越了埃隆·穆斯克的特斯拉成为全球最大的电动车辆销售商(EVs),标志着中国在年度销售中首次超越了美国对手.

items.title: Yemen clashes bring Saudi- and UAE-backed forces into confrontation
items.title_zh: 也门冲突使沙特和阿联酋支持的部队陷入对抗
items.summary: Yemen's future hangs in the balance after a dramatic turn of events in the south which have brought Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates into unprecedented direct confrontation and threaten the country with partition.
items.summary_zh: 在南部发生戏剧性事件,使沙特阿拉伯和阿拉伯联合酋长国陷入前所未有的直接对抗,并以分治威胁该国之后,也门的未来悬殊。

items.title: US slashes proposed tariffs on Italian pasta imports
items.title_zh: 美国对意大利面条进口品征收的关税
items.summary: Italian pasta is set to be spared from high-level US tariffs that the Trump administration had threatened against 13 producers.
items.summary_zh: 意大利面条被设定免受特朗普政府威胁对13个生产商的高水平美国关税.

items.title: Russia accuses Ukraine of killing 27 people in New Year attack in occupied Kherson region
items.title_zh: 俄罗斯指责乌克兰在占领的赫尔森地区新年袭击中杀害了27人.
items.summary: Russia has accused Ukraine of killing at least 27 people in a drone strike on a New Year's party in a hotel and cafe in the Russian-occupied southern Kherson region.
items.summary_zh: 俄罗斯指责乌克兰在俄罗斯占领的克森南部地区一家旅馆和咖啡馆对新年派对的一次无人机袭击中至少杀死了27人.

items.title: Dozens missing after boat carrying 200 migrants sinks off Gambia
items.title_zh: 载有200名移民的船在冈比亚出海后失踪数十人
items.summary: At least seven people have died and many others are missing after a boat carrying about 200 migrants attempting to reach Europe capsized off the coast of The Gambia, authorities say.
items.summary_zh: 当局说,在冈比亚沿海,一艘载有约200名移民的船试图驶入欧洲后,至少有7人死亡,还有许多人失踪。

items.title: Trump says he takes higher daily dose of aspirin than doctors recommend
items.title_zh: 特朗普说他每天服用的阿司匹林比医生推荐的要多
items.summary: US President Donald Trump says he is in "perfect" health, takes more aspirin than doctors recommend, uses makeup to cover bruising on his hands, and does not get regular exercise because he finds it "boring".
items.summary_zh: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普称他身体状况"完美",服用的阿司匹林比医生推荐的要多,用化妆来遮住手上的瘀伤,没有定期锻炼,因为他觉得"无聊".

items.title: Indian families grieve deaths caused by contaminated tap water
items.title_zh: 印度家庭对被污染自来水造成的死亡感到悲痛
items.summary: Sunil Sahu bitterly regrets the day his five-month-old son was given some cow milk diluted with tap water.
items.summary_zh: 苏尼尔 Sahu对5个月大的儿子被给一些被自来水稀释的牛奶感到非常遗憾。

items.title: Sailors saved from going over edge of huge dam
items.title_zh: 水手们从大坝上逃出
items.summary: Footage shows captured the moment four men were pulled to safety, after spending hours dangling off the edge of a 40m (130ft) dam in South Africa.
items.summary_zh: 4名男子被拖到安全的地方,

items.title: Maduro says Venezuela open to US talks on drug trafficking
items.title_zh: 马杜罗说委内瑞拉对美国关于贩毒的会谈持开放态度
items.summary: Venezuelan President Nicolás Maduro said on Thursday he was open to talks with the US on drug trafficking and oil, after weeks of an escalating pressure campaign against his government.
items.summary_zh: 委内瑞拉总统尼古拉斯·马杜罗(Nicolás Maduro)星期四表示, 在对委内瑞拉政府不断升级的压力运动之后,

items.title: Watch: Moment 400-pound runaway prop injures Disney employee
items.title_zh: 看着:400磅跑道具 伤害了迪士尼员工
items.summary: Footage shows the moment a worker at Walt Disney World was injured after being hit by a 400-lb (180kg) runaway fake boulder prop.
items.summary_zh: Footage显示一名在华特迪士尼世界(Walt Disney World)的工人被一辆400磅(180克)跑去的假巨石道具撞倒后受伤.

items.title: Japan PM joins fight for more female toilets in parliament
items.title_zh: 日本首相加入国会争取更多女性厕所
items.summary: Japan's Prime Minister Sanae Takaichi is among some 60 female lawmakers petitioning for more women's toilets in the parliament building to match their growing representation in the legislature.
items.summary_zh: 日本首相高一之子(Sanae Taka一)是约60名女性立法者之一,

items.title: 'You're invisible, you don't exist' - life without a birth certificate
items.title_zh: "你看不见,你不存在" - 没有出生证的生活
items.summary: Many people may take their birth certificate, or similar official papers, for granted - hidden in a drawer and rarely seeing the light of day - but for those without one, it can lead to a shadow life or an uncertain existence.
items.summary_zh: 许多人可以理所当然地领取出生证或类似的官方证件 -- -- 藏在抽屉里,很少看到白昼 -- -- 但对那些没有出生证的人来说,这会导致阴影的生活或不确定的存在。

items.title: Social media fuelled Mamdani's rise. Can he keep the momentum as New York mayor?
items.title_zh: 社会媒体推动了马姆达尼的崛起. 他能保持纽约市长的势头吗?
items.summary: Jumping into the frigid waters of Coney Island in January for a pun on "I'm freezing... your rent". Visiting food trucks to discuss how city permitting processes have led to "Halalflation". Walking the length of Manhattan to show New Yorkers they "deserve a mayor that they can see, they can hear, they can even yell at".
items.summary_zh: 一月份跳入科尼岛的冰冷水域 跳出"我快冻死了... 你的房租" 访问食品卡车,讨论城市许可过程如何导致"Halalflation". 走在曼哈顿的长度向纽约人展示他们"让一个他们可以看到,他们可以听到,甚至可以吼叫的市长".

items.title: Americans brace to start New Year without healthcare
items.title_zh: 美国人准备开始新年 没有医疗
items.summary: Adrienne Martin and her family are starting the New Year off without healthcare.
items.summary_zh: Adrienne Martin和她的家人 开始新年没有医疗。

items.title: New discovery may challenge theory Vikings built first Irish towns - researcher
items.title_zh: 新发现可能挑战维京人建立的第一个爱尔兰城镇——研究员
items.summary: A recently discovered large hilltop settlement could challenge the theory that the Vikings built the first towns in Ireland, a researcher has said.
items.summary_zh: 最近发现的一座大型山顶定居点可能会质疑维京人建造爱尔兰第一批城镇的理论,一位研究者说.

items.title: Stranger Things draws to an epic and emotional close
items.title_zh: 陌生人 事物吸引了史诗和情感的接近
items.summary: Stranger Things has drawn to an epic and emotional close, with a dramatic two-hour finale that briefly jammed Netflix's servers.
items.summary_zh: 陌生人 一场戏剧性的两小时决赛 短暂地卡住了Netflix的服务器

items.title: In pictures: New Year welcomed around the world
items.title_zh: 图片:世界各地新年欢迎
items.summary: Countries around the world have welcomed in the New Year.
items.summary_zh: 世界各国在新年都欢迎.

items.title: Zelensky says peace deal is 90% ready in New Year address
items.title_zh: Zelensky说和约90%准备在新年演讲
items.summary: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has said a peace agreement to end the war with Russia is "90% ready", in a New Year address that largely focused on resistance to Moscow's full-scale invasion.
items.summary_zh: 乌克兰总统沃洛德米尔·泽连斯基表示结束与俄罗斯战争的和平协议"九成准备就绪",在新年演讲中主要以抵抗莫斯科全面入侵为主.

items.title: What are Russians hoping for in 2026, asks Steve Rosenberg
items.title_zh: 2026年俄国人希望什么,问史蒂夫·罗森伯格
items.summary: As the New Year holiday gets underway, the BBC's Russia editor Steve Rosenberg asks people on the streets of Moscow about their hopes for 2026 and how they see their future.
items.summary_zh: 随着新年假期的到来,BBC的俄罗斯编辑史蒂夫·罗森伯格(Steve Rosenberg)询问莫斯科街头的人们对2026年的希望,以及他们如何看待自己的未来.

items.title: Passenger describes 'chaos' after head-on Machu Picchu train collision
items.title_zh: 乘客描述在马丘比丘火车相撞之后的"Chaos"
items.summary: A passenger has described "chaos" after two trains collided head-on near Peru's most popular tourist attraction, Machu Picchu.
items.summary_zh: 一名乘客描述了在秘鲁最受欢迎的旅游景点马楚比丘附近两列列火车相撞后相撞后"chaos".

items.title: Saving South Africa's threatened albatross from lethal fishing lines
items.title_zh: 从致命的钓鱼线上拯救南非受到威胁的信天翁
items.summary: On a small boat in the Atlantic, about 27 nautical miles (50km) away from South Africa's Cape Point, a group of bird watchers are calling out seabird names: "Atlantic yellow-nosed! Black-browed albatross!"
items.summary_zh: 在大西洋的一艘小船上,距离南非"角点"约27海里(50公里)外,一群鸟类观察者呼唤出海鸟的名字:"大西洋黄鼻! 黑发信天翁!"

items.title: The 'thorny' issues that threaten to derail a Russia-Ukraine peace deal
items.title_zh: 可能破坏俄乌克兰和约的"大问题"
items.summary: Russia, the US and Ukraine agree that a deal on ending almost four years of full-scale war is edging closer but, in the words of President Donald Trump, "one or two very thorny, very tough issues" remain.
items.summary_zh: 俄国、美国和乌克兰都同意, 结束近四年全面战争的协议正在逐渐逼近,
